articles.description: Just days after it was revealed that reclusive actress Shelley Duvall has made her return to acting for the first time in 20 years, the first trailer has debuted for her new film, The Forest Hills.
articles.content:

articles.author: Katie Sewell
articles.title: A look at Princess Kate's pop culture shoes two European royals adore too - Express
articles.description: Kate, Princess of Wales is one of several royal women to have worn a pair of famous pop culture heels in recent years.
